alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 13 at 5:39AM MST until December 13 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in freezing fog. Minor ice accumulation possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range including the Interstate 80 Summit. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Periods of freezing drizzle combined with very low visibility and freezing fog will result in hazardous travel conditions through Wednesday morning across southeast Wyoming. Please use extra caution over bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
